item.title: Yaml Syntax
item.description: Scalars Scalars are a pretty basic concept. They are the strings and numbers that make up the data on the page. A scalar could be a boolean property, like Yes, integer (number) such as 5, or a string of text, like a sentence or the title of your website. Scalars are often called variables in programming. If you were making a list of types of animals, they would be the names given to those animals.
